name: dataa
notes:
This dataset gathers messages of ongoing work from AA (Algorithmic Autoregulation) users. Such messages have the purpose of registering
worktime and activity, easing teamwork and resource sharing.
This dataset gathers nicks, messages, sessions, screencast links, rattings,
with appropriate datetime measures. Sources of messages are: MySQL database, MongoDB database and IRC logs from July/2011 to January/2015.

==
Link to primary source:
https://github.com/ttm/aa01

==
Thisese scripts uses MySQL, MongoDB dumps and IRC logs to delivera a RDF version of data:
https://github.com/ttm/aa01/blob/master/rdf/triplificaAA.py
https://github.com/ttm/aa01/blob/master/rdf/triplificaAAirc.py
https://github.com/ttm/aa01/blob/master/rdf/triplificaAAmongo.py


==
Related OWL ontologies:

OntologiAA:
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2014/09/ontologiaa.owl 
http://vocab.e.gov.br/2014/09/ontologiaa.ttl

(alternative:
https://github.com/ttm/aa01/blob/master/rdf/ontologiaa.owl
https://github.com/ttm/aa01/blob/master/rdf/ontologiaa.ttl
)

==
These are IPython Notebooks with online scripts to analyse this dataset:

http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/aa%20reasoning%20e%20participa.ipynb
http://200.144.255.210:8080/notebooks/cidade%20democr%C3%A1tica%2C%20aa%20e%20participa.ipynb

==
Related Documents:

(academic article) http://wsl.softwarelivre.org/2013/0004/

(academic article sketch and data mining) https://github.com/ttm/ensaaio/raw/master/ensaio.pdf

(undp product) https://github.com/ttm/pnud5/raw/master/latex/produto.pdf

==

project BRA/12/018), SNAS/SGPR from the Brazilian Presidency, and the Postgraduate Committee of the São Carlos Physics Institute (IFSC/USP).
Authors thank Datahub.io team for hosting the present triplestore.
title: Algorithmic Autoregulation RDF data
